name: The Timeless Tome
description:
Waking up with amnesia in a mysterious haunted mansion, you must find your way out, collecting clues concerning your past along the way. 

Game submitted for Global Game Jam 2021 

Programmers:  Teo Lee (ttslee), Johnny Ngo (phnjohnny)

Artist: Gina Ha (Novalitea), Sophia Johnson, Jeamison Yoon-Hendricks

Writer: Dori Holly (sweetpotatoqt)

SFX & Music: Dori Holly (sweetpotatoqt)
